pageContext.claim: “Through the association health plans -- thank you, Secretary Acosta -- we've expanded access to affordable, high-quality healthcare, particularly for employees of small businesses and self-employed individuals.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is overpromising. The quality of AHPs will probably vary dramatically depending on who they’re targeting and states regulations. They’re exempt from federal coverage requirements that apply to the individual and small group markets, but states have taken steps to varying degrees to regulate AHPs.
